name: Bob
body: <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head>     <title>QA</title>     <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">     <script src="/index.js" defer></script>     <script src="/MyTimer.js"></script>     <link href="/index.css" rel="stylesheet" />  </head> <body>     <div class="grid-container">         <div class="header">             <div class="qaLogo"> <img src="/qa_logo.svg" /> </div>             <div id="course_title"></div>             <h3 id="trainer"></h3>         </div>       <div id="timer_container">         <qa-timer id="qaTimer"></qa-timer>        </div>          <div class="passwords">             <emoji>&#128218</emoji>             <a id="material" href="" target="_blank">                 Course material             </a>             <button onclick="copy(courseData.password1)">Copy email</button>             <button onclick="copy(courseData.password2)">Copy password</button>             <button onclick="copy(courseData.password3)">Copy access code</button>             <button onclick="mimeo()">Mimeo</button>          </div>         <div class="pcs">             <ol id="pcs"></ol>             <div style="display: flex">                 <textarea rows="7" id="txtArea"></textarea>             </div>         </div>          <div class="afa">             <button onclick="afa()">Copy WebEx</button>             <select id="cboMessages"></select>             <a href="https://signin.qa.com/" target="_blank">Sign</a>             <h3><img src="/webcam.svg" /> Please turn your webcam on ðŸ˜Š</h3>         </div>          <div class="students"><object id="studentMessages" data="/chat/student"></object></div>         <div class="messages">             <div class="MessagesDiv">                 <object data="/chat/trainer" height="550" width="100%"></object>             </div>         </div>     </div> </body> </html>
